Articles.Content:
Is it heavier than a turkey?

What if it were a turkey? A turkey heavier than a turkey?

The question is just: If anyone were to guess it correctly, would Rows say so?

No. My lips are sealed on this one.

While we're waiting, did anyone bother to listen that hour and a bit of podcast the other day? I don't have the bandwidth or the time to sit through all that waffle just to get one or two bullet points. Was there anything in it?
Sorry guys, but the decision was made to merge the threads. Keeps all the discussion in one spot.

I really would love if the "mystery feature" would remain hidden for players to discover it.

According to PC Gamer

If we had our way, we would tell no one about it and just let you guys discover it through gameplay with hilarious results."

Hilarious results... DRE!

Probably not. But hey, we can dream.

I really would love if the "mystery feature" would remain hidden for players to discover it.

According to PC Gamer

Hilarious results... DRE!

Probably not. But hey, we can dream.

I agree. But because we have a lot of streamers for the game, and youtubers, etc on the forums too, i just can't believe it would be possible.

I really would love if the "mystery feature" would remain hidden for players to discover it.

According to PC Gamer

Hilarious results... DRE!

Probably not. But hey, we can dream.

Rowsdower already said that it's not DRE

Things that we only get to see if we're doing badly? Hmm...

Kerbal hospital. Kerbal protests. Kerbals quitting/refusing to work/misbehaving. Being fired. Bailouts. Government hearings...

lol

And what next? Protests in front of KSC against benefits abuse?

Sorry guys, but the decision was made to merge the threads. Keeps all the discussion in one spot.

Vanamonde it says you have 4,444 posts. Impressive. Well I have my schedule left open at 4:30 pst That is 7:30 EST, right?

No. My lips are sealed on this one.

So it's something to do with glue, then?

So it's something to do with glue, then?

Or lips!

Stupid character limit.

Or lips!

Stupid character limit.

Possibly seals.

Folks have been asking for better hydrodynamics for a while.
I really think they should go for the option of "Don't tell anyone and let people find out in-game". That would be pretty awesome, and i love surprises .

I really think they should go for the option of "Don't tell anyone and let people find out in-game". That would be pretty awesome, and i love surprises .

Media team would find it. Especially Danny.
hi you kerbals like the first page because i think there is something that i miss just tell me

Lot of activity on the Steam KSP infodb.

Ah, the steamdb. 0.24 hypetrain nostalgia
Perhaps we are approaching the QA period? Or '0.24.3' is coming out, with the Spaceplane Plus parts? I don't know.

Perhaps we are approaching the QA period? Or '0.24.3' is coming out, with the Spaceplane Plus parts? I don't know.

I strongly doubt we'll get any updates before 0.25 releases. Actually, I'm damn sure there won't be an extra update for the SP+ parts. Wouldn't make any sense, really.

Progress on this update seems to have gone real quick. A lot of content as well!

So excited!!!
Or they could be releasing it tonight. Highly unlikely, but a possibility.

Or they could be releasing it tonight. Highly unlikely, but a possibility.

Unannounced big feature in 0.25 will be an addition of the StarForce DRM. Highly unlikely, but a possibility.

Unannounced big feature in 0.25 will be an addition of the StarForce DRM. Highly unlikely, but a possibility.

Dont even remind me that!..
The big unannounced feature is the banana. #HypeBanana
I would be surprised if it came out in September. My money is on October definitely.
